FuncDef: This command specifies the amount of time that the ingress node holds before programming its data plane and declaring the LSP up to the service module. This occurs anytime the ingress node brings up an LSP path or switches traffic from a working path to another working path of the same LSP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time (in seconds), for which the ingress node holds before programming its data plane and declaring the LSP up to the service module. Values-0 to 10.
